description:

		- addr.send(msg.value) (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#16)

C.bad3_transfer(address).addr (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#23) lacks a zero-check on :
		- addr.transfer(msg.value) (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#24)
